name: What would Satan do?
description:
What would Satan do? is a social deduction game of Witches vs Satanists. One of the witches has been possessed by Satan but who wants to help exorcise the possessed witch and who wants to spread lies?

Other than in Werwolf in WWSD no one dies so there is no long boring down time.
In order to play the game you need to use 5 phones or more that are compatible with AR Foundation. You also need to print out the pentagram and put it in the middle of the table.
See if your phone is compatible in this list:

The zip folder includes written rules, the pentagram image, a set up guide and of course the apk.
